nodes.text: A Holy Hutch was an exclamation used by the Lepi smuggler Jaxxon. It apparently referred to a sacred home of the species. During his attack against the Behemoth from the World Below, Jaxxon mentioned the "heavenly hutches", when he was nearly killed by the beast. He also mentioned "the Holy Hutch" when he was captured by bounty hunters loyal to Beilert Valance.
